00038   class base : public boost::noncopyable {
00039   public:
00040     typedef boost::shared_ptr<base> sptr;
00041 
00042     enum {
00043       max_buffer_size = 20*1024*1024 // 20 MB: enough space for 1 sec 2MS/s which is 12,000,000 bytes
00044     } ;
00045     typedef boost::array<char, max_buffer_size> data_buffer_type;
00046     typedef data_buffer_type::const_iterator const_iterator;

00059       throw std::runtime_error("processor::base::process is not implemented");
